name: saai-ecosystem
description: Sistema Autónomo de Asistencia Inteligente - Ecosistema Cuántico de IA

scripts.dev:agents: echo 'Python agents would run here (limited to standard library in WebContainer)'
scripts.dev:core: echo 'Rust core would run here (not available in WebContainer)'
scripts.build:agents: echo 'Python agents build would run here'
scripts.build:core: echo 'Rust core build would run here (not available in WebContainer)'
scripts.test:core: echo 'Rust tests would run here (not available in WebContainer)'
scripts.lint:core: echo 'Rust linting would run here (not available in WebContainer)'
scripts.docs:core: echo 'Rust docs would run here (not available in WebContainer)'
scripts.setup:agents: echo 'Python setup would run here (pip not available in WebContainer)'
scripts.setup:core: echo 'Rust setup would run here (cargo not available in WebContainer)'

author: SAAI Development Team
